title: Bam Bam Bam Bambaram Lyrics Raja Mandhiri Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Bam Bam Bam Bambaram
Singer(s): Chinna Ponnu

Bam Bam Bam Bambaram
konda vachcha bambaram
thambikkitta thoththuputta
variya oru aattam

hey ram bam bam bam
bambaram
konda vachcha bambaram
summaakaachu thoththom
varalaam maruaattam

pongadaa dey
naanga thaana serndha koottam
naanga yaarum vara maattom
vittu thara maattom
idhu yaaru vachcha sattam

enna adichchaalum
pudichchaalum
sanda vandhu
kadichchaalum
paasaththukku
panjamum illa.
indha anna thambi
oorula illa.

Bam Bam Bam Bambaram
konda vachcha bambaram

indha annan thambi
kadhaya kettaa
suththidum thala unakku.

oor suththum kuruvinga
veettukku thirumba
peththa manasukulla varum
kannula aruvi.
category: Song:Bam Bam Bam Bambaram - Raja Mandhiri
